titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the assizes in Salisbury upon Saturday, July 23. 1653 By Henry Carpenter, vicar of Steeple-Ashton in Wiltshire.
titleStmt.author: Carpenter, Henry, 1605 or 6-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Macock for Octavian Pullen, and are to be sold at the sign of the Rose in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Rose in Pauls Church-yard
